ComicInfo.Summary:
The very first appearance of the Thunderbolts!
With the general public still unknown of the team's true identities, the Thunderbolts try to win over the public by setting out to capture the Hulk. They find him in a rodeo. However The Hulk, manages to escape by destroying a dam forcing the Thunderbolts to save the people and town from destruction,enabling the Hulk to escape but not before their actions are filmed by the spectators.
